If they would only look unto Jesus, and for one moment discern truly, sincerely, what love has been expressed in the sacrifice 
                                                                           923
which has been made for them! If only they could see the determined efforts of Satan to eclipse by his hellish shadow every ray of light that would come into the mind and heart of persons now dead in trespasses and sins! O that they would awake from their torpor as the whole world will soon awake by the trumpet of God, which will announce His appearing! . . .
